Key Match Events: Hungary scored the opening goal in the 32nd minute through Roland Sallai after Zsolt Nagy's assist.
Virgil van Dijk was sent off in the 79th minute with a second yellow card for a challenge on Kevin Csoboth.
Denzel Dumfries scored the equalizing goal for Netherlands in the 83rd minute with a header from Cody Gakpo's free kick.
Post-Match Reflections: Netherlands manager Ronald Koeman expressed frustration with the red card and the result but praised the team's resilience.
Hungary head coach said the team showed character in securing the draw despite being down to 10 men.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Netherlands dominated possession with 84% in the first half.
Hungary had only one shot on target which resulted in the goal.
The match was halted briefly due to an indirect free kick in the first half.
Others: The result leaves Netherlands second in Group A with five points, while Hungary remains third with two points.
